She sits up slowly, groggy, smiling at her slumbering wife, who's breasts are barely contained in the tight white bra she wore to sleep, her matching panties likely looking beautiful as usual on her.

Catherine slowly shifted out of bed, heading to the dresser, her feet pressing softly against the carpet, wood scraping against wood as she pulled the drawer out to get her outfit nice and ready. She found a pair of pink panties with hearts on them and slipped them on, finding a matching bra and fitting it tightly onto her breasts before clasping it, and assembling her work uniform. She put on her store's standard T-shirt, and got on a pair of black skinny jeans, struggling to fit them onto her large rear end, jumping slightly to get her wobbling bottom into the tight black fabric. After a few moments of struggle, she managed to get them on, albeit very tightly, noting how the crease in the back wedges firmly between her fat cheeks, giving her a bit of a pants-wedgie. She dismissed it, knowing it wouldn't be a problem, and began to get ready to head downstairs for breakfast, unknowingly tucking her shirt into her panties, the waistband of which was above her jeans, leaving the embarrassing pink fabric on display.

Who humiliates Catherine?
12.title: Catherine

info.brief_description: A story about a family of women that are constantly put into humiliating situations.
info.description:
In this story, one or more women will be the center-focus of all of the rest of the chapters. That girl will either be humiliated or humiliate others, not necessarily restricted to just women in the family.

Any given fetish is allowed, but there are a few rules:

No death (if you want to remove a character, write them out, don't kill them. This way they can return if someone wants them to and it doesn't get messy.)

Be grammatically competent. Chapters can be as long or short as you'd like, but they need to be readable.

Don't ruin a line of chapters by shifting focus to another character. Either follow that character's line, or make an option to shift focus as an addition to a chapter for that character - don't ruin other people's chapter lines.

If you want to include a fetish that "doesn't fit", or is otherwise "out there", make it one of the options at the end of a chapter so you don't "ruin" the chapter(s) for anyone uninterested in that fetish.

No males. Pretty simple.

As I said before, any fetishes are allowed, from spanking to wedgies to watersports! As long as it involves humiliation in even the slightest way, it's fine! Have fun!
